Kicker {U} [i](You may pay an additional {U} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
When Eager Inventor enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains flying and haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: [i]“I suppose I could spend more time fine-tuning it, but I'd rather just use it now.”[/i]
